1.01.name: wordpress/dirty-suds-export-to-indesign
1.01.description:
Adds a metabox to the post editor to export a post as Adobe TaggedText that can be placed in an Adobe InDesign document. The export process will attempt to keep the significant formatting from the post, including <strong>, <em>, <b>, <i>, <li> tags.

If you have suggestions for new features, please add them to our Fundry page (see FAQ)
